short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find all your important links, documents, bookmarks all in one place, organized and Searchable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Selaro helps you to automatically classify and search all your documents, apps, links and bookmarks. All your data is kept on your browser and not transferred anywhere giving you complete control.
